tool_description:
A flexible RESTful prayer times API that returns JSON times for a given day or a calendar for a whole month.

For more detailed documentation, various methods and additional endpoints, please see the complete documentation on http://aladhan.com/prayer-times-api.
title: Prayer Times

api_list.name: Calendar by Address
api_list.description: Get a prayer times calendar for a month by address

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Any of the prayer time calculation methods specified on https://aladhan.com/calculation-methods

parameters.name: school
parameters.description: 1 for Hanfi. 0 for all others, including, Shafi, Hanbali, etc.

parameters.name: latitudeAdjustmentMethod
parameters.description: Method for adjusting times higher latitudes - for instance, if you are checking timings in the UK or Sweden. 1 - Middle of the Night 2 - One Seventh 3 - Angle Based

utterances.utterance: What are the prayer times for New York City in March 2023?
Can you provide the prayer calendar for London in December 2022 using the Shafi school?
Get me the prayer times for Cairo in July 2024 with the Egyptian General Authority method.
I need the prayer schedule for Paris in May 2025 using the Angle Based latitude adjustment.
Show me the prayer times for Tokyo in January 2023 with the Middle of the Night latitude adjustment.
What are the prayer times for Sydney in August 2023 using the One Seventh latitude adjustment?
Provide the prayer calendar for Istanbul in November 2022 using the Umm al-Qura University method.
Can I get the prayer times for Dubai in February 2024 with the Hanfi school?
Fetch the prayer times for Los Angeles in June 2025 using the ISNA method.
I need the prayer schedule for Berlin in September 2023 with the MWL method.
